scripts.build:all: pnpm wasm:build && pnpm build:popup && pnpm build:extension
scripts.wasm:build: cd crates/engine && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../packages/core-wasm --out-name core_wasm && node ../../scripts/patch-wasm.js
scripts.launch: start-server-and-test "http-server apps/extension -p 5173 -c-1" http://localhost:5173/test-page.html "cd apps/extension/dist && web-ext run --browser-console --devtools --start-url http://localhost:5173/test-page.html"
